product_summary: Strollr is an AI-powered walking tour app that provides fully customized tours based on user preferences. It allows users to explore new places and experiences around the globe, save tours for future travels, and get recommendations for historic landmarks, romantic strolls, and more. With its intuitive interface and comprehensive features, Strollr empowers travelers to plan and budget their trips seamlessly.
product_pros: Fully customized tours based on user preferences
Exploration of new places and experiences around the globe
Handy tools for planning and budgeting trips
Wide range of tour recommendations for various interests
product_cons: May require an internet connection for full functionality
Accuracy of tour recommendations may vary depending on location and user preferences
Limited availability in certain regions or cities
Potential for battery drain when using the app for extended periods
Lack of real-time tour guide interaction

product_usecases.details: Explore historic landmarks and learn about the rich past of cities like Paris, London, and Barcelona.
Plan a romantic stroll through Venice or Avignon, discovering hidden gems and picturesque spots.
Get personalized recommendations for local experiences, hidden gems, and off-the-beaten-path attractions.
Plan and budget future travels with ease, saving customized tours for easy access.
Experience the Gothic quarter of Barcelona, the vibrant streets of New York, or uncover the cultural heritage of various cities.

product_toolfor.details: Plan and enhance their travel experiences with customized walking tours.
Discover new cities and attractions through personalized recommendations.
Explore historic landmarks and learn about the past in an engaging way.
Uncover hidden gems and off-the-beaten-path experiences.
Plan and budget their trips effectively with the app's handy tools.

product_pricing: Pricing information for Strollr is not available on the provided website.
